OrgName: Steele International, Inc. d/b/a The Steele Foundation
activities: The Steele Foundation provides a variety of background and due diligence investigations services and corresponding reports on legal entities and principals and acts as a data processor on behalf of its individual and corporate clients.  In most cases, the subjects of the investigation have provided background information which is verified for accuracy and also to confirm that the entities and subjects have not engaged in activities prohibited by law.  Data sent to Steele from the EU is housed on secure servers and only Steele employees and Steele's clients have a need to know such information are given access to the data.  Steele clients and prospective clients may also provide personal information to Steele through its website, including signing up for various Steele publications.  Steele uses such data for purposes of marketing and business development and client support.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
